known_issues: Header company name wraps to two lines beside the logo; should be single line.
Header company name text color is purple; should be brand blue #010080.

existing_features.title: Update the header (logo + company name area) so the company name renders as a single line to the right of the logo (no line break/wrapping into two lines).
Change the header company name text color from the current purple to the brand blue #010080.

new_feature_requests.summary: Header: keep company name on a single line beside the logo and change its text color from purple to brand blue #010080

projectName: Fix header company name wrapping and set brand blue text color
